participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: outgoing and competitive, enjoys sports and socializing with friends.
participant_1.background: my mother is a dentist. i'm currently looking for a job preferably at a restaurant. i like playing basketball. my favourite artist is travis scott. i have one older sister.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: friendly and nurturing, loves spending time outdoors and values family connections.
participant_2.background: i enjoy long walks with my dog. i'm married to a doctor. i am a professional tennis player. my family is continuously growing. i live in a three storey house.
